trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: Espone i tipi <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> all'automazione interfaccia utente.

trans-unit.source: The element associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Elemento associato a questo peer di automazione.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Minimizes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" />.
trans-unit.target: Riduce a icona <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" />.

trans-unit.source: This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.IsMinimized%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo imposta la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.IsMinimized%2A> proprietà `true`.

trans-unit.source: An object that is in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Un oggetto che si trova in <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" /> for the specified item.
trans-unit.target: Crea un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" /> per l'elemento specificato.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" /> that is associated with the specified item.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" /> associato all'oggetto specificato.

trans-unit.source: Restores the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" />.
trans-unit.target: Ripristina il <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" />.

trans-unit.source: This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.IsMinimized%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo imposta la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.IsMinimized%2A> proprietà `false`.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state, expanded or collapsed, of the control that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene lo stato espanso o compresso del controllo associato a questo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The state of the control that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Stato del controllo associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il tipo di controllo per l’oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Tab" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di enumerazione <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Tab" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la raccolta di elementi figlio dell’oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.

trans-unit.source: The child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Elementi figlio dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A> method returns a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> objects that represent the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.ApplicationMenu%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.QuickAccessToolBar%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> objects that belong to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A> il metodo restituisce una raccolta di <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> gli oggetti che rappresentano il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.ApplicationMenu%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.QuickAccessToolBar%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> gli oggetti che appartengono al <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome dell’oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.

trans-unit.source: The type name of the associated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" />.
trans-unit.target: Il nome del tipo dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> associato.

trans-unit.source: A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Enumerazione di valori che specifica il pattern di controllo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il pattern di controllo per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.IsCollapsed" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> is <see langword="false" /> and <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Selection" /> value, this method returns an object that supports the control pattern; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.IsCollapsed" /> di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> è <see langword="false" /> e <paramref name="patternInterface" /> è il valore <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, o <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Selection" />, questo metodo restituisce che supporta il pattern di controllo, altrimenti <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" /> is off the screen.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l’elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" /> è fuori dallo schermo.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> is collapsed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> è compresso; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This API is not implemented.
trans-unit.target: API non implementata.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> allows more than one child element to be selected concurrently.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che specifica se <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> consente di selezionare più di un elemento figlio contemporaneamente.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" /> in tutti i casi.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Questo membro è un’implementazione esplicita di un membro di interfaccia.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Può essere utilizzato solo quando si esegue il cast dell'istanza <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer> a un'interfaccia <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> requires at least one child element to be selected.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che specifica se <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> richiede la selezione di almeno un elemento figlio.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> in tutti i casi.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Questo membro è un’implementazione esplicita di un membro di interfaccia.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Può essere utilizzato solo quando si esegue il cast dell'istanza <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer> a un'interfaccia <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider>.
